title: Futbol Americas: Should Pulisic be the USMNT captain?
description:
On Thursday's episode of Futbol Americas, Sebastian Salazar and Herculez Gomez react to UEFA Champions League performances from CONCACAF players. Then, 2022 MLS Golden Boot winner Hany Mukhtar joins the show to talk about his season with Nashville. Next, ESPN Deportes analyst Antonio Valle joins the show to recap the Liga MX playoffs. Also, Jeff Kassouf joins the show to discuss the USWNT and their chances at the World Cup following consecutive defeats against England and Spain.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: The Chelsea winger downplays the importance of the captain's armband
